author: Staff Reporter
text:
Most of the accidents happen only because of not obeying traffic rules by motorist and drivers of four-wheelers.

Hence, obeying traffic rules is important for the safety of the riders and also for all the road users, this was one of the message stressed during a street-play enacted by students of SKV Vidhyaashram at Kandampalayam in Tiruchengode bus stand here on Friday.

To create social awareness on various topics, 18 students formed smaller groups among themselves and performed five street plays for five minutes on each topic. Topics include, cleanliness and sanitation, obeying traffic rules, protecting environment, awareness against consuming liquor and preserving the trees and the forest resources. The message is so simplified that students through their performance disseminated the importance of each topic so that the public not only became aware of it, but also follow it.

Earlier, students took out a rally in the bus stand area spreading the importance of self-discipline in each ones life for a prosperous society. Students of Class 4 and 5 participated in the rally raising slogans for a healthier society. P. Ravi, chairman of the institute, M. Balasubramaniam, treasurer, S. Yeshwanth, principal of the school and teachers were also present.
title: Obey road rules, save lives
